code: import React from'react';import{Dropdown}from'react-bootstrap';import'./Order.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Order=_ref=>{let{order,handleAction}=_ref;const{_id,name,email,serviceName,status}=order;const setBackground={color:'#FFFFFF',background:status==='Pending'?'rgb(255 78 96)':status==='On going'?'rgb(73 146 255)':'rgb(31 204 123)'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:serviceName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dropdown,{class:"statusBtn",id:"dropdown-basic-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Toggle,{style:setBackground,children:status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dropdown.Menu,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:()=>handleAction(_id,"Pending"),id:"pending",children:"Pending"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:()=>handleAction(_id,"On going"),id:"ongoing",children:"On going"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:()=>handleAction(_id,"Done"),id:"done",children:"Done"})]})]})})]});};export default Order;
